name: ReservedItemSlotCore
description: The core mod for all ReservedItemSlot mods. Adds functionality for all ReservedItemSlot mods.

name: ReservedWalkieSlot
description: Gives a free, dedicated Walkie slot on the right side of your screen. You can press [X] to activate and speak into the Walkie at anytime.

name: ReservedFlashlightSlot
description: Gives a free, dedicated Flashlight slot on the right side of your screen. Can be toggled with [F] to activate the Flashlight at anytime.

name: AlwaysHearActiveWalkies
description: Allows you to hear active walkies even when you're not holding them.

name: ShipLoot
description: Reliably shows the total value of all scrap in your ship.

name: FasterRocket
description: A mod for Lethal Company that makes the supply rocket (ItemDropship) arrive faster

name: LateCompany
description: A mod to allow players to join after the game starts.

name: MoreItems
description: Changes the max amount of items that the game saves from 45 to 999. Requires BepInEx.

name: Hold_Scan_Button
description: This mod allows you to hold the scan button to continuously keep scanning instead of having to spam the button.

name: AutoFlyToCompany
description: automatically fly to the company when there are no days left to meet quota

name: LethalExpansionCore
description: De-bloated LethalExpansion fork with only the LethalSDK module support

name: HidePlayerNames
description: Simple mod to hide player names

name: SellMyScrap
description: Adds a few terminal commands to sell your scrap from the ship. Highly Configurable. SellFromTerminal +

name: HealthMetrics
description: Add a simple health counter on your HUD
